remarks: Value of the functionalized Hom-set operation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jan-2017.)
statement:
homffval.f $e |- F = ( Homf ` C ) $.
homffval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
homffval.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
homffval $p |- F = ( x e. B , y e. B |-> ( x H y ) ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y $.
$d H x y $.
$d x y $.
$d x y $.
$d x y $.
